attributes.action: Why are we allowing illegal immigrants to enter Britain on boats from France?
attributes.additional_details: We have a British Passport to prove that we are British citizens. There are ways to apply legally for British citizenship. Illegal entry to the country makes a mockery of the laws under which we have to live
attributes.background: I would like the government to set up a task force to stop illegal entry into British waters.

rejection.details:
Under international law, it is legal for a person to apply for asylum in any country that has signed the 1951 Geneva Convention and to remain there until the authorities have assessed their claim. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to withdraw from international treaties that give people the right to seek asylum in the UK, if that's what you'd like to happen.
